properties.sfomuseum:description: Two-page advertisement from March 30, 1946 issue of Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “Now you can fly to Paradise”; color illustration depicting tropical landscape framed by lei, surrounded by smaller color photographic images of tourist activities.
properties.sfomuseum:subject: Pan Am promotional advertisement
properties.wof:name: advertisement: Pan American World Airways, Saturday Evening Post
